message: I understand you want to be fair, but time is money Alice! This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
You're right, time is money, but I still think I deserve a bit more!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This is a good deal for both of us.  Every round that passes hurts us both.
I see you're getting anxious, but I'm willing to compromise... a little.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a perfectly even split now before inflation eats away at any chance of a decent agreement.
You should have thought of that before, I'm not settling for half now.
